about_the_game:
【Overview】

Assist the proud sorceress Amelia as she explores the dungeon and encounters all sorts of lewd events in this Roguelike RPG!

Shuttle between the damp, dark, tentacle-filled dungeons and the nearby town, with all sorts of perverted surprises in store for our busty mage.

Whether it's from tentacled monsters or regular ol' horny humans, naughty perils await the haughty Amelia!

Maintain her chastity 'till the very end, or let her fall into depravity... You decide what happens to Amelia!

【Synopsis】

In the holy city Crescent, rumors are afoot about a deadly labyrinthine dungeon after none of the scouting parties were ever heard from again.
Amelia, renown sorceress and adventurer also received a request to explore that mysterious dungeon.

The proud sorceress unfortunately misjudged the dungeon and became parasitized by one of its tentacle creatures.
The parasite has already begun to slowly weaken her powers. Will she be able to complete her mission?

【Characters】

※H-scenes are only for Amelia.

【Explore the roguelike labyrinth】

Take Amelia through the ever-changing, tentacle-filled dungeon filled with naughty traps that are sure to ensnare the weakened mage.

Use Amelia's ranged attacks to strike enemies from afar or put your staff and items to work!

If the tentacles get to Amelia, they'll show no mercy!

If Amelia doesn't break free in time, she'll run out of mana, and her body will become its plaything...

Tentacles may also attach themselves to Amelia's body as the traps grow more treacherous!

Get rid of them, or they'll slowly manipulate Amelia's mind and body!

If Amelia is too far gone, she'll be stuck in a never-ending orgasm!

Earn money at the town or loot the dungeon for items and gear to help with the mission!

【Get to know the locals】

Amelia can purchase powerful staffs at Lilia's store and shop around for other convenient items!

She can also grab a part-time job in town, but watch out for pranksters! These "pranks" can get more serious the more Amelia works...

Try getting Amelia to wear a vibrator as she speaks to the locals.
If she strips naked in the middle of town, who knows how they'll react?

Amelia must maintain her mental state and keep the parasite in check. Lewd events get more intense the more her mental state declines.
If the parasite growth is unchecked, it'll corrupt Amelia and change her appearance!
Her changed appearance will show up in all dungeon events.
Purchase special items like vibrators to trigger some of the lewd events in town.

Make Amelia wear a maid, bunny, dancer, or bikini outfit, and enjoy the special event that comes with each of them!

As the parasite grows, its tentacles will slowly corrupt Amelia's body, modifying her appearance.

If Amelia becomes fully parasitized, will she lose control?

Or will she finally make peace with the tentacles?

Experience different endings based on your mental state and parasite levels!

Make your choices and play through five main story routes!



*All content within the game is uncensored.*

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning! This game contains: gang rape, pregnant sex, interspecies sex, bondage, non-consensual sex, hypnosis, tentacles, exhibitionism, anal sex, paizuri, blowjobs, use of sex toys, prostitution, BDSM, violent content, sex acts and sexual assault.

name: Amelia and the Erotic Tentacle Trap Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Intel Graphics
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: The proud sorceress Amelia has been parasitized by a tentacle creature! Help her explore a treacherous dungeon and manage the lust of all the men in town in this naughty roguelike RPG!
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
